author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Rounding out our tour of Batman film props from Propstore's upcoming auction are miniature vehicles created for the special effects of Batman Returns! Chief among them is the Batmobile, specifically a transforming effects model that was used for the Batmobile's conversion into the bullet train-like "Batmissile" escape car. Rewatch that scene and see if you can spot the shots where this model was used!

Learn more about the upcoming Propstore EMLA: Los Angeles summer 2025 auction at https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/456
Batmissile scene in Batman Returns: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QKcdaTUoj3g

Shot by Joey Fameli and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: How the Batmobile Transformed in Batman Returns!
